FREE_TRIAL.TITLE: Start Your 24-Hour Free Trial Now! - Nutritechagro
FREE_TRIAL.DESCRIPTION: Start your 24-hour free trial and experience the best in live TV and on-demand content.

FREE_TRIAL.TITLE: START YOUR <Span1>24-HOUR</Span1> FREE <Span2>TRIAL</Span2> NOW!
FREE_TRIAL.DESCRIPTION: Start your 24-hour free trial and experience the best in live TV and on-demand content.

FORM.COUNTRIES: Which countries' channels do you want for your trial?
FORM.DEVICES_HINT: Example: Smart TV, Mobile, Tablet, Laptop, MAG, etc.
FORM.EXISTING_PLAYER: Do you have an existing player on your device?
FORM.TERMS: By clicking the button, you agree to our <Link1>Terms & Conditions</Link1> and <Link2>Privacy Policy</Link2>.

TRIAL_DETAILS_RECEIVED.TITLE: Thank you for your interest!
TRIAL_DETAILS_RECEIVED.DESCRIPTION: We will send you an email with your trial details shortly.
TRIAL_DETAILS_RECEIVED.CHECK_SPAM: If you haven't received the email, please check your spam folder. Alternatively, you can reach out to us via WhatsApp or Telegram, by providing your trial ID at {{contactNumber}}.
TRIAL_DETAILS_RECEIVED.WHATSAPP_MESSAGE: Hello! I'm interested in trying out Nutritechagro. My trial ID is {{trialId}}.

ALREADY_TRIED.DESCRIPTION: If you think this is a mistake, please contact us by clicking <Link>here</Link>.
